row1.title: RESPONSIVE DESIGN
row1.description: - Your website will look and function perfectly on any device - from large desktop screens to tablets and smartphones. I carefully design and test each page to ensure it's fully responsive, so your visitors always get the same smooth experience no matter how they browse.

row2.title: FAST LOADING SPEEDS
row2.description: - Speed is everything! A slow website loses visitors before they even see your content. That's why I focus on optimized performance and efficient hosting setups to make sure your site loads instantly and runs reliably.

row3.title: MODERN, CLEAN DESIGN
row3.description: - Every design choice is tailored to your brand and audience. Clean layouts, balanced spacing, and visuals that feel both professional and modern.

row4.title: DOMAIN AND HOSTING GUIDANCE
row4.description: - I'll help you set up your domain and hosting the right way - secure, reliable, and fast. Whether you already have a provider or need help choosing one, I'll walk you through the process so your website is live and running without any confusion.

row5.title: SEO SETUP
row5.description: - Your website will be built with search engines in mind from day one. I'll optimize your structure, metadata, and keyword placement to help you appear on Google and reach more potential customers.

row1.title: Website Maintenance
row1.description: Keep your site fast, secure, and up-to-date with monthly performance checks, content updates, and continuous technical support.

row2.title: SEO Optimization
row2.description: Monthly boost your visibility and ranking on Google with targeted keyword setup, metadata tuning, and site speed optimization.

row3.title: AI Chatbot Integration
row3.description: Add a custom AI-powered chatbot that greets visitors, answers questions, or captures leads - perfect for businesses, clinics, or service providers.

row4.title: Analytics & Tracking
row4.description: I'll set up Google Analytics, visitor tracking, and performance dashboards so you know exactly how your audience interacts with your site - and where you're converting best.

row5.title: Motion & Interaction Design
row5.description: Smooth scroll effects, fade-ins, and subtle animations that make your website feel modern and alive - designed to enhance user engagement and perceived quality.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how I collect, use and protect your personal data when you visit rinobago.com ("Website").
Privacy.controllerText:
The data controller responsible for your personal data is:

Rino Bago
Website: https://rinobago.com
Email: contact@rinobago.com
Privacy.dataText: When you contact me via the contact form or by email, I may collect your name, email address and any other information you include in your message. I use this data only to read and respond to your inquiry and to communicate with you about potential projects.
Privacy.technicalText: When you visit the Website, certain technical information may be collected automatically, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system and the pages you visit. I use this information to keep the Website secure, improve its performance and understand how visitors use it.
Privacy.sharingText: I do not sell your personal data. I may share it only with trusted service providers (such as hosting, email or analytics providers) who help me operate the Website and who are contractually required to protect your data.
Privacy.retentionTitle: 5. How long I keep your data
Privacy.retentionText: I keep your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected or as required by law or legitimate interests (for example, to establish or defend legal claims). Contact messages are typically kept for up to 24 months after our last communication.
Privacy.rightsText: You have the right to request access to your personal data, correction of inaccurate data, deletion of data, restriction of processing, data portability and to object to certain types of processing. To exercise these rights, contact me at contact@rinobago.com. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.
Privacy.cookiesText: The Website may use cookies to function properly and to help me understand how it is used. Where required by law, non-essential cookies are only used with your consent, which you can withdraw via your browser settings.
Privacy.changesText: I may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in legal requirements or how I process personal data. The updated version will always be available on this page.
Privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how I handle your personal data, please contact me at contact@rinobago.com.
Privacy.disclaimer: This text is a general informational template and does not constitute legal advice. For full compliance, please consult a qualified legal professional.
